title: Google’s next Nexus to use Huawei chip, not Snapdragon | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Huaweilogo]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * **Related:** [11 Best AndroidSmartphones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)That puts it firmly in flagship territory, which means the new Nexussmartphone could be a formidable offering to the smartphone space.It’s also worth mentioning that there’s a current trend in the industry ofmanufacturers weaning themselves off Qualcomm chips, with both[LG](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-tipped-to-battle-snapdragon-with-high-end-mobile-chip) and [Samsung](https://www.trustedreviews.com/samsung-galaxy-s6-review) seemingly looking to shun the Snapdragon series.Whatever the case, both Huawei and Google will have to work hard to repair thedamage the [Nexus 6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review) and [Nexus9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-9-review) did to the respectability ofthe Nexus line-up.
